title: Movie Title
logline: A brief summary of the movie's plot.

screenplay.description: A brief description of the scene's setting and action.

screenplay.scene_details: Comma-separated tags that visualizes each and every detail of this scene. Also contains story context leading to this scene in detail.
screenplay.note: Director's or writer's note about this scene.
